Constructs a new {{tt|directory_entry}} object.

@1@ Default constructor.
@2@ Defaulted copy constructor.
@3@ Defaulted move constructor.
@4,5@ Initializes the directory entry with path {{c|p}} and calls {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/directory_entry/refresh|refresh}} to update the cached attributes. If an error occurs, the non-throwing overload leaves the {{tt|directory_entry}} holding a default-constructed path.
